text: Coimbatore–Jaipur Superfast Express (Train Nos 12969/12970) is a Super fast express weekly train run by Indian Railways between Coimbatore Main Junction in Tamil Nadu and Jaipur in Rajasthan. ==Service and schedule== The train starts on Fridays from Coimbatore and on Tuesdays from Jaipur, covering the total distance of in approximately 45 hours.http://etrain.info/in?TRAIN=12969http://etrain.info/in?TRAIN=12970 ==Route and stations== This train passes through 37 intermediate stations including Kota, Ujjain, Bhopal, Itarsi, Nagpur, Vijayawada, Tiruvottiyur, Chennai Central, Perambur railway station, Katpadi, Jolarpettai, Salem and Erode. ==Coach and rake== The Coimbatore–Jaipur Superfast express has rake sharing arrangement with 12975/12976 Jaipur–Mysore Superfast Express and 12967/12968 Chennai Central–Jaipur Superfast Express. The train has 11 sleeper coaches, 7 AC coaches, 1 pantry car and 4 general coaches. The train is pulled by Erode WAP-4, Vadodara WAP-4 and Bhagat Ki Kothi WDP-4B. ==References== ==External links== * 12969 Time Table * 12970 Time Table Category:Rail transport in Tamil Nadu Category:Express trains in India Category:Transport in Coimbatore Category:Transport in Jaipur Category:Railway services introduced in 1998
title: Coimbatore–Jaipur Superfast Express
